_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Gate
author: yan.mf@outlook.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y wget

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server

wget https://github.com/minekube/gate/releases/download/v${GATE_VERSION}/gate_${GATE_VERSION}_linux_amd64

wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/minekube/gate/master/config.yml

cp gate_${GATE_VERSION}_linux_amd64 gate

rm -rf gate_${GATE_VERSION}_linux_amd64

chmod +x gate
